Features:
Automated Documentation: Scribe AI uses generative AI to create company-specific processes tailored to your unique business, automating the most dreaded part of work: documentation
Integration with Web Apps: Scribe AI works with any web app on any browser, making it easy to create and customize guides on any platform
Quick Customization: The tool offers quick and efficient creation of tutorials and guides, with a wide range of customization options for content
Branded Guides: Scribe AI allows users to create branded guides with their company's logo and colors, removing the Scribe branding
Export Formats: Users can export guides to HTML, Confluence, and Markdown formats
Desktop Capture: Scribe AI can capture processes on desktop-based applications
Multiple Workspaces: The tool allows users to manage documents and users across multiple teams, with admins able to review and approve new guides before publishing them to the company's workspace
Review & Approval Queue: Scribe AI offers a review and approval queue for managing the publishing process
Sensitive Data Redaction: The tool can redact sensitive information from screenshots
Smart Embed: Scribe AI allows users to embed their guides and pages into knowledge bases, wikis, and more
Suitable For: Scribe AI is designed to simplify the process of creating educational guides and documentation, making it beneficial for teachers, students, and businesses.
Pricing:
Free Plan: This plan allows users to create how-to guides in a few clicks, works with any web app on any browser, offers quick customization, and allows for easy sharing of links in seconds. Up to 10 guides and Pages.
Pro Plan: The Pro plan is priced at $29 per month and offers additional features such as branded guides, export to more formats (HTML & Markdown), and the ability to export to Confluence.
